meanings.definition: A person who receives something along with others.
meanings.sent1: During the party, the corecipients shared the delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The corecipients of the award were thrilled to be recognized together.
meanings.sent3: The corecipients of the surprise gift looked at each other in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as corecipients of the scholarship brought them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The corecipients formed a strong team to tackle the project.

meanings.definition: The act of receiving something along with others.
meanings.sent1: The corecipients of the donation expressed their gratitude.
meanings.sent2: Corecipients of the charity event enjoyed the experience together.
meanings.sent3: The corecipients of the raffle prize cheered in unison.
meanings.sent4: The corecipients of the package eagerly opened it together.
meanings.sent5: Being corecipients of the surprise made the moment even more special.
